EmailTemplate.name: NQT Induction 5 year rule - Expired
EmailTemplate.subject: NQT Induction 5 year rule - Expired
EmailTemplate.textOnly: NQT Induction 5 year rule expired, {!TR1__Associated_Qualification__c.TR1__Contact__c} can no longer be placed as a teacher in a maintained school unless it is a LT or Perm role with induction – please contact candidate and any clients this candidate is placed with as a teacher. Please update candidate record SET options From – the Compliance Team
